root.name: Arc the Lad: Kijin Fukkatsu
root.description: Arc the Lad: Kijin Fukkatsu focuses on Elc rather than Arc, whose village was burned and his family was shot. Elc's story eventually intertwines with Arc's story. This is a spin-off that was released in 2002 and is related to Arc the Lad II, which was released on the PlayStation in 1996.
